frontmatter.title: Mountains or hill tops?
frontmatter.excerpt: PaperFaces portrait of @jinthagerman drawn with Paper for iOS on an iPad.

markdownRemark.html:
PaperFaces portrait of @jinthagerman. Landscapes are more forgiving, I think that’s why I spend time drawing them over facial features.

And just so it’s recorded, this is the illustration I was working on when my Pogo Connect Smart Pen died. Was trying to paint a large continuos tone to define the mountains and instead was left with choppy marks. Examined the Pogo’s tip and noticed a metal contact that should be attached to the internal circuit board was instead stuck to the magnetic tip. Bummer.

Tools used:

  • LunaTik Alloy Touch Pen
  • Paper for iOS
